# a [[Belizean]], member or descendant of the people of Belize, either the former British Honduras or the city it was renamed after
types.html:
Bélizien m (plural Béliziens, feminine Bélizienne)

  1. a Belizean, member or descendant of the people of Belize, either the former British Honduras or the city it was renamed after
trans: a Belizean, member or descendant of the people of Belize, either the former British Honduras or the city it was renamed after
